==Profile==
<!--Detailed story/lore information goes here.-->
Tomohiro is a mask seller. He is seen talking to [[Thoma]] while the latter is trying to haggle the price of the five masks he bought.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|The Currents of Life}}</ref>
